script:
ObjC.import("stdlib")

const appearance = Application("System Events").appearancePreferences

switch ($.getenv("target_mode")) {
  case "on": appearance.darkMode = true; break
  case "off": appearance.darkMode = false; break
  case "toggle": appearance.darkMode = !appearance.darkMode(); break
  default: throw "Invalid mode: " + $.getenv("target_mode")
}
taskDescription: Enable, disable, or toggle Dark Mode
